summary: This is a brief email chain forwarding a letter regarding Jeffrey Epstein from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida. It indicates official communication about the Epstein case was being sent via FedEx.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email subject and forwarded letter concern Epstein, indicating he is the focus of official correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Official Letter Regarding Epstein Sent
events.description: The First Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida sends a signed letter with attachments regarding Jeffrey Epstein, to be followed up via FedEx.

locations: S.D. of Florida (Southern District of Florida)
keyFacts: On June 3, 2008, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida was actively communicating about Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication involved a formal, signed letter with attachments being sent via FedEx.
The correspondence was sent on behalf of the First Assistant U.S. Attorney, indicating high-level involvement in the Epstein matter.
